    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void createConfigDirectoryAndFilesIfNotExists()
      Helper method that creates a config file directory and checks for presence of the default properties files If directory does not exist, it creates it, and then proceeds to copy the default properties files from the classpath resources folder.
      static String getDurationAsISO8601(Duration duration)
      Returns a ISO 8601 HH:mm:ss.SSS formated string of a Duration object
      static Properties readConfigurationFromFile(String path)
      Retrieve a set of properties from a .properties configuration file

    • Method Detail

      • getDurationAsISO8601

        public static String getDurationAsISO8601(Duration duration)
        Returns a ISO 8601 HH:mm:ss.SSS formated string of a Duration object
        Parameters:
        duration - A Duration object
        Returns:
        The formated string in HH:mm:ss.SSS format

      • readConfigurationFromFile

        public static Properties readConfigurationFromFile(String path)
        Retrieve a set of properties from a .properties configuration file
        Parameters:
        path - The relative path to the configuration file (including filenam)
        Returns:
        A Properties object containing the data from the configuration file, null if errors during read.

      • createConfigDirectoryAndFilesIfNotExists

        public static void createConfigDirectoryAndFilesIfNotExists()
        Helper method that creates a config file directory and checks for presence of the default properties files If directory does not exist, it creates it, and then proceeds to copy the default properties files from the classpath resources folder.
